text: We had simillar issue with the Lavision UMII; basically if the mosaic is just made of 1 column or 1 row, that`s fine: BigStitcher can recognize the volume as separated tiles and also each file as single Z plane (note: it didn`t work for very large files!); if there columnsANDrows, the file naming is not recognized and we generally need to 1) open each tile 2) save it as a single TIFF (quite a pain!);otherwise we can rename the file (with a renaming software in a way that there is just one value for each tile). To overcome the issue of Lavisiono naming (2 varible to speciify each tile position) we have been suggested by Lavision staff to set not a "mosaic", but a "multiposition" experimement: we found it complicated (need to manuallly specify overlapping..). Hope it helps..
